previewArticle.title: Chivas USA vs. Sporting Kansas City | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Chivas USA 0, Sporting Kansas City 4 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: A pair of teams looking to put an end to long droughts meet when Chivas USA play host to Sporting Kansas City on Friday evening at StubHub Center.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Chivas USA vs Sporting Kansas City | September 12, 2014

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Offside, Sporting Kansas City. Graham Zusi tries a through ball, but Aurélien Collin is caught offside.
Foul by Bobby Burling (Chivas USA).
Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Mike Pacific
timelineItems.text: Did Matt Besler’s cast get bigger? #CHVvSKC #analysis

timelineItems.name: rstrube07
timelineItems.text: Stadium Club Box seats perks of the job #ChivasUSA #MLs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Marvin Chávez (Chivas USA) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Félix Borja with a headed pass.
Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Seth Sinovic.

timelineItems.desc: Marvin Chavez (Chivas USA) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Marvin Chavez tackles Feilhaber from behind

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Marvin Chávez (Chivas USA).
Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: How many players does it take to get a ball over to the corner flag? 7 apparently. The number is 7. #CHVvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Aurélien Collin.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: That was almost not a good thing for Sporting, but Olum clears with the count 0-1.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Toni (Sporting Kansas City).
Leandro Barrera (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Dominic Dwyer attacks the goal but has his shot blocked into the arms of Kennedy

timelineItems.name: Henry Hauck
timelineItems.text: Need to tighten things up in the back. 12 straight games without a shutout for KC. #CHVvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Benny Feilhaber.
Foul by Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City).
Akira Kaji (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 16' Dwyer marauds down the left side and pulls the trigger from a tight angle. It takes a deflection straight at Dan Kennedy. 0-0 #CHVvSKC

timelineItems.name: Reporting KC
timelineItems.text: Solid opening for #SportingKC. Key passes could be more accurate but holding possession well and establishing itself in final third #CHVvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City).
Bobby Burling (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Tony Lochhead (Chivas USA).
Match ends, Chivas USA 0, Sporting Kansas City 4.

timelineItems.name: Nick Cresswell ⚽
timelineItems.text: Back on track! What a match boys! #SKC

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: FULL TIME! @SportingKC cruises to a 4-0 victory over @ChivasUSA with goals from @Ddwyer14, @b_feilhaber22, @gzusi & @TacaBielerSKC. #CHVvSKC

timelineItems.desc: A pair of teams looking to put an end to long droughts meet when Chivas USA play host to Sporting Kansas City on Friday evening at StubHub Center.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Chivas USA vs Sporting Kansas City | September 12, 2014

timelineItems.comment: Félix Borja (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Matt Besler (Sporting Kansas City).
Delay in match Marvin Chávez (Chivas USA) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) header from the center of the box is close, but misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Dominic Dwyer skies for the header but can’t put it on frame

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Toni (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Jhon Kennedy Hurtado.
Attempt missed. Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Graham Zusi with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Henry Hauck
timelineItems.text: Chavez injury allowed for a Mourinho's tactical timeout. #CHVvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Toni.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 24' Good pressure from SKC as Chivas repels a series of crosses. Now a stoppage in play as Chavez is down holding his foot. 0-0 #CHVvSKC

timelineItems.name: Henry Hauck
timelineItems.text: Dwyer jumped early & the suspension wouldn't let him put that on frame. #CHVvSKC

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Pardon the pun but one thing that just doesn't translate through tv is just how much running Collin does for #SKC He is all over! #CHVvSKC

timelineItems.name: Henry Hauck
timelineItems.text: This is like preseason games at Disney when you can hear the tactical information from the coaches. #CHVvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Matt Besler (Sporting Kansas City).
Delay in match Igor Julião (Sporting Kansas City) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Scary moment here.Big collision. Mass confrontation Feilhaber down. Been down for a few minutes. #CHVvSKC Play has stopped.

timelineItems.name: The Blue Testament
timelineItems.text: Ouch. Igor crunched coming down the flank. Sporting have no defenders on the bench… #CHVvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Nigel Reo-Coker (Chivas USA).
Igor Julião (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City).
Bobby Burling (Chivas USA) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 33' Sinovic's long throw nodded clear by Burling. Juliao then lofts a ball to the far post and Kennedy rises high to claim it. 0-0 #CHVvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Marvin Chávez (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City).
Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Jhon Kennedy Hurtado (Chivas USA).
Delay in match Lawrence Olum (Sporting Kansas City) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Chivas USA 0, Sporting Kansas City 1. Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from the center of the box to the center of the goal. Assisted by Graham Zusi.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Dominic Dwyer beats Kennedy to set the single season goal scoring record for KC

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Nathan Sturgis (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Kyle Marlin
timelineItems.text: WAY TO GO @DDWYER14!!!!! #THEMAN #ALLLGOALS #SKC #CHVvSKC

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: It was going to happen! Only surprised it didn't happen sooner--Dwyer has been knocking all night. Chivas, once again, chasing #CHVvSKC

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: That's the record, and a 1-0 lead. Dwyer with his 19th of the year. Special season. And it's only his third year as a pro.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Sporting Kansas City. Lawrence Olum tries a through ball, but Dominic Dwyer is caught offside.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Felix Borja (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Felix Borja has his low drive parried away by Gruenebaum

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Andy Gruenebaum.
Igor Julião (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jhon Kennedy Hurtado (Chivas USA).
Attempt saved. Félix Borja (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Nigel Reo-Coker.
Foul by Tony Lochhead (Chivas USA).
Toni (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: #ChivasUSA hasn't led in a game since in exactly two months, their July 12 victory over Vancouver

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 43' Shot falls to Borja from 22 yards out, and Gruenebaum dives left to push it past the post for a corner kick. 0-1 #CHVvSKC

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Chivas USA 0, Sporting Kansas City 2. Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from very close range to the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Benny Feilhaber pounces on the rebound after Dovale hits the post

timelineItems.comment: Toni (Sporting Kansas City) hits the left post with a left footed shot from the right side of the box. Assisted by Dominic Dwyer.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Benny, angry Benny ...

timelineItems.name: Baldi-LOX
timelineItems.text: BENNY!!! #SKC

timelineItems.name: Jason Weaver
timelineItems.text: Goals, guys. GOALS. #CHVvSKC

timelineItems.name: Ben Thompson
timelineItems.text: I would feel bad for Chivas being subjected to all of this pent up frustration by SKC but I just don't. #SKC

timelineItems.comment: Nigel Reo-Coker (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City).
First Half ends, Chivas USA 0, Sporting Kansas City 2.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: That was Nani-esque, except he wasn't offside and the ball wasn't already going in and nobody on his team wanted to strangle him.

timelineItems.name: Jeff
timelineItems.text: Not very classy of @b_feilhaber22 to celebrate like that in front of Chivas' fan. #MLS #SKC

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Meanwhile, @Ddwyer14 broke the @SportingKC single-season goal record with this finish. http://t.co/TJSWKkJbNi #CHVvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Chivas USA 0, Sporting Kansas City 2.
Foul by Nathan Sturgis (Chivas USA).
Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Chivas has a steep climb here. For starters, allowing #SKC 5 shots in the box isn't going to cut it.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Akira Kaji.

timelineItems.text: Chivas free kick led to some danger but #SKC able to clear

timelineItems.text: 47' Zusi plays a corner kick short to Sinovic. Dovale eventually gets off a cross and Chivas clears downfield. 0-2 #CHVvSKC

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Chivas USA 0, Sporting Kansas City 3. Graham Zusi (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom right corner.

timelineItems.text: Benny starts it & ends it: http://t.co/n43qtV6xHq #CHVvSKC http://t.co/co0XJDU8mo

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: .@ChivasUSA (6-15-6, 24 pts) is last in the Western Conference and winless in nine straight matches (0-8-1 during that stretch). #CHVvSKC

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: .@SportingKC (12-10-6, 42 pts) has lost four straight games but trails Eastern Conference leaders @dcunited by only five points. #CHVvSKC

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 4 - SKC have lost four #MLS games in a row for the first time since losing five in a row in April/May 2011. Valley. #CHVvSKC

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 1 - Chivas USA have scored just one first half goal in their last eight #MLS meetings with SKC. Sluggish. #CHVvSKC

timelineItems.name: Bart Ewing
timelineItems.text: SKC need to stay emotionally in control something they've struggled with recently #skc

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: Dwyer has scored eight goals on the road this season, tied for most in @MLS and the most in @SportingKC regular season history. #CHVvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Toni (Sporting Kansas City).
Eric Avila (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Dos equipos de capa caída. Comienza ahora @cdchivasusa vs @SportingKC: http://t.co/MWLzioq45l #CHVvSKC http://t.co/1nqxCRSnjp

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Pretty impressive group of #SKC traveling fans made the trip to StubHub tonight. Maybe we can commiserate together about the Royals.

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Cree
timelineItems.text: All 14 fans at Stub Hub arena are excited to see the match!! #CHVvSKC

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Mikey Lopez still doesn't have both names on the back of his shirt yet. Someone needs to make that happen.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Toni.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 62' SKC defends a free kick and subsequent corner before Avila smashes a shot over the crossbar from 15 yards out. 0-3 #CHVvSKC

timelineItems.name: Henry Hauck
timelineItems.text: Every Sporting player must wear a wrist wrap of some kind correct? A contract requirement, like a twitter account. #CHVvSKC

timelineItems.desc: Lawrence Olum (Sporting Kansas City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Lawrence Olum crunches Avila

timelineItems.name: Eric Harris
timelineItems.text: Thank god there is Chivas for ending losing streaks. Good to see goals from Dom, Benny and Zusi. #SKC

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Thought that was No. 20. So did Dwyer.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Another good night for Nagamura. Makes sense to get him out now.

timelineItems.text: Wow another goal for @SportingKC making it 0-3 for #CHVvSKC #mls #soccer http://t.co/8K6ox6bXly

timelineItems.text: Peter Vermes is a brilliant coach. The man never gives up, keeps pushing the team until they get good results. #SKC

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Just over the bar. The net is happy and relieved.
